title: TFR Ep. 586: Spider-Man: No Way Home, Nightmare Alley, 10 Most Anticipated Films of 2022
description:
This week on a special non-holiday version of The First Run, Chris and Matt discuss Matt’s most anticipated film of the year. It’s finally here, Tom Holland stars in Jon Watts’ ‘Spider-Man: No Way Home’.  Marvel’s flagship character completes his trilogy with laughs, loves, shocks and thrills.  But can it actually meet Matt’s lofty expectations?  Then, on any other weekend, Guillermo Del Toro’s latest film, ‘Nightmare Alley’ dropped to little fanfare.  The former Best Director and Picture winner delivers his adaptation of a little known, but classic film noir from 1947.  Does Del Toro imagination improve on the original, or was it better leaving well enough alone?  There’s the big releases on Physical Media, featuring the Streaming and Straight to DVD Picks of the Week, likely delivered by elves since we fired all the interns.  The show then closes with Matt and Chris sharing their 10 Most Anticipated Films of 2022. Come on Avatar 2!

00:00-12:55: Intro/Spider-Man: No Way Home

12:56-23:26: Spider-Man: No Way Home Spoilers

23:27-31:40: Physical Media Picks

31:41-44:18: Nightmare Alley

44:19-01:04:33: 10 Most Anticipated Films of 2022

01:04:34-01:06:09: Wrap Up

Theme music by Jamal Malachi Ford-Bey

Twitter

Instagram

Facebook
